solution_line_template: In one party, the total amount of money collected from the football players is ${fee_per_player}*{num_players}= $<<{fee_per_player}*{num_players}={amount_per_party}>>{amount_per_party}

If eight such parties are done in a year, the total amount of money collected from the parties is ${amount_per_party}*{num_parties} = $<<{amount_per_party}*{num_parties}={total_amount}>>{total_amount}
